front.title: IEEE Draft Guide for Field Testing of Gas-Insulated Substations Rated above 52 kV
front.abstract: Information of special relevance to the field testing of newly installed, gas-insulated substations (GIS) is provided in this guide, which is intended to supplement IEEE Std C37.122(TM). This guide is applicable to all GIS above 52 kV. This guide is applicable to all gas-insulated substations (GIS) above 52 kV.
